new_workout.title: New Workout
new_workout.sport_type_question: What type of exercise do you intend to create?
new_workout.muscle_group_question: Which muscle groups do you intend to focus on?
new_workout.public_label: Do you want to make your workout public?
new_workout.public_description: By making your workout public, other users will be able to view and use your routine as a reference.

toast.success_description: Your new workout has been created and will be available in the workout list.
toast.error_description: An error occurred while creating your workout. Please try again.

home.dev_desc: We are constantly evolving the platform. Some features may be under construction or undergo adjustments in the coming weeks.
home.last_training_days: Your last workout was <bold>{{days}} day(s)</bold> ago
